text: Shen Daren () (June 1928 – August 2, 2017) was a Chinese politician. He was born in Wu County, Jiangsu. He was Communist Party of China Committee Secretary of Ningxia (1986–1989) and his home province (1989–1993). He was a delegate to the 8th National People's Congress (1993–1998) and 9th National People's Congress (1998–2003). Shen died on August 2, 2017 in Beijing at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:Politicians from Jiangsu Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Shen Daren
